code: import React from"react";import avatarImage from"../assets/avatar-image.png";import"../styles/avatar.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Avatar=_ref=>{let{page}=_ref;const avatarClass="avatar ".concat(page);const spanClass="shadow-overlay-".concat(page);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:spanClass}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:avatarImage,className:avatarClass,alt:"avatar"})]});};export default Avatar;
